biotools.summary:
Automatic segmentation of prostate magnetic resonance imaging using generative adversarial networks.

This repository is the official repository of the article "Automatic Segmentation of Prostate Magnetic Resonance Imaging Using Generative Adversarial Networks" To train a model use the train.py file, you can use the following commands line to get the important arguments.

You can config the detailed parameters in the config.py.

To do the inference, use the test.py file, you can use the following commands line to get the important arguments.

bioschemas.name: SegDGAN
